trans-unit.source: Provides a framework for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> elements that virtualize their child data collection.
trans-unit.target: 자식 데이터 컬렉션을 가상화하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 요소를 위한 프레임워크를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.

In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: "이러한 맥락에서 가상화" 나타냅니다는 기술 기준인의 하위 집합 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 요소가 화면에 표시 되는 항목에 따라 데이터 항목의 많은 수에서 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time.
trans-unit.target: 메모리와 프로세서를 많이 생성 측면에서 비효율적 없으면 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 일부만 지정된 된 시간에 화면에 있을 수 있는 경우 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A panel that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>, calculates visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements for visible items.
trans-unit.target: 상속 하는 패널을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>와 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>표시 되는 항목을 계산 하 고 협력 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> 에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) 만들도록 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 표시 되는 항목에 대 한 요소 .

trans-unit.source: The following lists describes cases when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> cannot virtualize item containers:
trans-unit.target: 다음 목록에서는 경우가 설명 되어 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> 항목 컨테이너를 가상화 할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contains item containers of different types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> 서로 다른 형식의 컨테이너의 항목을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> might have items that use both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects as the item containers.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> 함께 사용 하는 항목이 있을 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> 항목 컨테이너로 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: You explicitly create the item containers to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 명시적으로 대 암시적 항목 컨테이너에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> 는 항목 컨테이너를 가상화 할 해야 할 수 있습니다 대신 데이터 항목 자체를 사용 하 여 컨테이너와 연결 된 상태 정보를 저장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an item is contained by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 항목이 포함 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> 데이터 항목 자체 아닌 항목 컨테이너에 바인딩된 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> is reused for a new item, the current value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> is used for the new item.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> 에 새 항목의 현재 값에 대 한 다시 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> 새 항목에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the old item does not retain its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 또한 저장 된 기존 항목이 유지 하지 않는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the derived <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 파생을 사용 하는 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> 클래스 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> child to add to the collection.

Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren" /> collection of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> element.

This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법에 대 한 더 나은 성능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 보다 자신의 자식 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the item that is generated and made visible.
When implemented in a derived class, generates the item at the specified index location and makes it visible.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 구현되는 경우 지정된 인덱스 위치에 항목을 생성하고 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the item that is generated and made visible.
Generates the item at the specified index location and makes it visible.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스 위치에서 항목을 생성하고 표시되도록 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength" /> attached property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit" /> attached property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 계층 구조로 그룹화 또는 구성된 항목을 가상화할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 계층 구조로 그룹화 또는 구성된 항목을 가상화할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CanHierarchicallyScrollAndVirtualizeCore%2A>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 계층 구조로 그룹화 또는 구성된 항목을 가상화할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> and support virtualizing items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy should override this method to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 상속 된 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> 그룹화 또는 계층 구조로 구성 하는 항목을 가상화 지원을 반환 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 해야 하 고 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength" /> attached property from.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength" /> property.
The size of the cache before and after the viewport when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> is virtualizing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 가상화하고 있는 경우 뷰포트 앞과 뒤의 캐시 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit" /> attached property from.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit" /> property.
The type of unit that is used by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength" /> property.
The default is of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit.Page>.
The element to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable" /> attached property from.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable" /> property.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> should virtualize an item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />에서 항목을 가상화해야 하는 경우 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable%2A> attached property `true`.
The object from which the attached property value is read.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing" /> attached property.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> is virtualizing its content; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 콘텐츠를 가상화하고 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A> property is `true`.
The element to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping" /> attached property from.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping" /> property.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> virtualizes the grouped items in its collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />에서 컬렉션의 그룹화된 항목을 가상화하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping%2A> property is `false`.
The element whose position to find.
Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />을 기준으로 하는 지정된 항목의 위치를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position of the specified item, relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.GetItemOffsetCore%2A>.
The element whose position to find.
Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />을 기준으로 하는 지정된 항목의 위치를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: 0 in all cases.
Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> should override this method to return the position `child`, relative to the panel.
trans-unit.target: 상속 된 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> 위치를 반환 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 해야 `child`패널에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> attached property from.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> property.
A value that indicates whether scrolling is measured as items in the collection or as pixels.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤을 컬렉션에 있는 항목으로 측정할지 픽셀로 측정할지 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollUnit.Item>.
The object from which the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> property is read.
Returns the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> attached property for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 개체에 대해 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> 연결된 속성을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the object uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 컨테이너 재생을 사용하는지 여부를 지정하는 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position within the collection at which the child element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 내에서 자식 요소를 삽입할 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> child to add to the collection.

Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren" /> collection of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 요소의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren" /> 컬렉션에서 지정된 인덱스 위치에 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법에 대 한 더 나은 성능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 보다 자신의 자식 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable" /> attached property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping" /> attached property.
Gets a value that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
Called when the collection of child elements is cleared by the base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 클래스에 의해 자식 요소 컬렉션이 지워질 때 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that raised the event.
Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event.

Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 컬렉션이 변경될 때 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The beginning index position within the collection at which the first child element is removed.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 내에서 첫 번째 자식 요소가 제거되는 시작 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The total number of child elements to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 제거되는 자식 요소의 총 개수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes child elements from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren" /> collection.

This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법에 대 한 더 나은 성능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 보다 자신의 자식 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> attached property.
The object to set the property on.
The size of the cache before and after the viewport when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> is virtualizing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 가상화하고 있는 경우 뷰포트 앞과 뒤의 캐시 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength" /> attached property.
The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 캐시는 항목이 가상화되지 않는 뷰포트 위 또는 아래 공간 양입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: 캐시를 사용 하 여 생성 되지 않도록 하려면 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 요소 뷰로 스크롤할 하는 대로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> property determines the unit of measurement that is used by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> 속성에서 사용 되는 측정 단위를 결정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
The type of unit that is used by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength" /> property.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit" /> attached property.
The object to set the property on.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> should virtualize an item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 항목을 가상화해야 함을 나타내려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable" /> attached property.
The object to which the attached property value is set.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> is virtualizing; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />이 가상화하고 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizingProperty" /> attached property.
The object to set the property on.
<see langword="true" /> to specify that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" /> virtualizes the grouped items in its collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />이 컬렉션에서 그룹화된 항목을 가상화하도록 지정하려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping" /> attached property.
The object to set the property on.
A value that indicates whether scrolling is measured as items in the collection or as pixels.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤을 컬렉션에 있는 항목으로 측정할지 픽셀로 측정할지 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> attached property.
The element on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> property.
One of the enumeration values that specifies whether <c>element</c> uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: <c>요소</c>가 컨테이너 재생을 사용하는지 여부를 지정하는 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> attached property on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 개체에 대해 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> 연결된 속성을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the changed item is a direct child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />; <see langword="false" /> if the changed item is an indirect descendant of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 변경된 항목이 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />의 직접 자식이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 변경된 항목이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />의 간접 하위 항목이면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Contains data regarding the changed item.
Returns a value that indicates whether a changed item in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> affects the layout for this panel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />에서 변경된 항목이 이 패널의 레이아웃에 영향을 주는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the changed item in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> affects the layout for this panel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />의 변경된 항목이 이 패널의 레이아웃에 영향을 미치면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the changed item is a direct child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />; <see langword="false" /> if the changed item is an indirect descendant of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 변경된 항목이 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />의 직접 자식이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 변경된 항목이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />의 간접 하위 항목이면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Contains data regarding the changed item.
Returns a value that indicates whether a changed item in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> affects the layout for this panel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />에서 변경된 항목이 이 패널의 레이아웃에 영향을 주는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the changed item in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> affects the layout for this panel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />의 변경된 항목이 이 패널의 레이아웃에 영향을 미치면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> dependency property.
